body_text: How did Rock Lee pass the academy test? I stumbled over this question on Facebook. I was wondering how Rock Lee got out of the academy and why did they let him leave?

Why didn't Naruto pass the academy exam when Lee was able to? Lee could not use chakra and thus could not perform any of the 3 techniques. However, Lee managed to pass the academy exam, while Naruto couldn't.
Why did Naruto fail when he could easily perform the Henge and Kawarimi and clearly had too much chakra for the Bunshin?
